GameItemType.Description: Horses grant your units more speed in combat and in travel, allow them to carry more weight, and make them immune to being knocked prone.
Horses grant your units more speed in combat and in travel, allow them to carry more weight, and make them immune to being knocked prone.
A lone pony in the world of Elemental. You aren't sure how it got here.
Warhorses grant your units more speed in combat and in travel, allow them to carry more weight, and make them immune to being knocked prone.
Wargs are faster than horses, but unable to carry as much weight.
Wargs are faster than horses, but unable to carry as much weight.

GameModifier.Provides: Tangled Web- Target enemy is immobilized for 3 rounds.
Fire Breath- Target unit is enveloped in fire, taking caster's attack strength in fire damage.

GameItemType.Description: These giant boars are more dangerous than their riders.
